seeds.text: Migration must complete before April planning cycle.
Security policy requires MFA for all admin actions.
Incident channel is #ops-incidents and escalation is 15 minutes.
Release cannot proceed without passing integration tests.
Monthly cloud spend must stay below 20000 USD.
Pager rotation changes every Monday at 09:00 UTC.
Database backups are required every 6 hours.
Enterprise customer SLA target is 99.95 percent uptime.
